channel.title: Ffx2
channel.description: does any one play final fantasy X-2? ive had it forever and im just starting to play it... is it good?

item.title: Ffx2
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“premier, post:9, topic:24057”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=36532.msg448360#msg448360 date=1163369466]
Sorry to hijack your thread but:

Has anybody bought ffxii? It looks pretty sweet and I’m debating whether or not I should go buy it right now. I’m trying to save my money though.
[/quote]

my freind has it… it is fun but ALOT different then any other FF… the fiends are always there and then attack you while your walking around unless you kill them… but the story is ok. it takes place n ivalice(same as tactics advance[/quote]
My main concern is random battles. I HATE random battles lately… But from what I’ve been hearing the battle system in this game is much different. Maybe I’ll buy it this weekend. Thanks

The other thing I’m begging to dislike about final fantasy games is that they are getting too much into the steam punk genre. It’s hardly even fantasy anymore with these futuristic flying cars and whatnot.

Read full topic

my freind has it… it is fun but ALOT different then any other FF… the fiends are always there and then attack you while your walking around unless you kill them… but the story is ok. it takes place n ivalice(same as tactics advance

item.title: Ffx2
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

FFX was much better. More traditional.

FFX-2 was ok. Not great.

If you get 100% you get the ‘perfect ending’ which is…ok. Not a fantastic ending i dont think, could have been longer/better.

Read full topic

item.title: Ffx2
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

FFX-2 sucks.

In my opinion, Yuna sucks with no aeons, wow she can sing! Rikku was never good in FFX anyway and Payne was to add a goth theme to the game.
